title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Adam Faust, Dan Lennington, & Yukong Zhao | 5/4/21
description:
As Bank of America warns that “transitory hyperinflation” is coming, Glenn shares ways you can prepare for a massive economic downturn. Farmers are suing the government for racial discrimination, claiming that white farmers are barred from getting “disadvantaged” farmer loans. Dairy farmer Adam Faust and his legal counsel Dan Lennington break down their case. President of the Asian American Coalition for Education Yukong Zhao joins to share how Asians are overlooked by the Left’s narrative of systemic racism and where the real discrimination against them is coming from.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
